inputs.name: token
inputs.description: ERC20Basic The address of the token contract

inputs.name: contractAddr
inputs.description: The address of the Ownable to be reclaimed.

abiDocs.name: reclaimEther
abiDocs.details: Transfer all Ether held by the contract to the owner.

inputs.name: from_
inputs.description: address The address that is transferring the tokens

inputs.name: value_
inputs.description: uint256 the amount of the specified token

inputs.name: data_
inputs.description: Bytes The data passed from the caller.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
